mapper.select: select prod_id, round(ratio_to_report(count(*))over(partition by grouping(prod_id)) *100, 1) as percent from v_graphs where prod_id = #{prod_id} group by prod_id, family_num order by family_num asc

select prod_id, round(ratio_to_report(count(*))over(partition by grouping(prod_id))*100, 1) as cnt from(select prod_id, trunc((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') - substr(birth, 1, 4))/10) as age from v_graphs where prod_id= #{prod_id} group by prod_id, birth) group by prod_id,age order by age
